Stacey Solomon turned up to Loose Women to present in her boyfriend Joe Swash’s suit jacket, a tiny playsuit and SLIPPERS today. 
The former X Factor runner-up was at the BRITS last night, and insisted she’d been in bed by midnight. 
But her dishevelled look was down to her losing her backpack filled with all her clothes for today on the red carpet. 
Speaking on Loose Women, Stacey explained: “I stayed in a hotel so I was closer to the studios so i wasn’t late. Stacey turned up wearing the same makeup as the night before (Photo: ITV) She'd lost her backpack on the red carpet (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN) She was also wearing slippers! (Photo: ITV) 
"I'd walked with this backpack, filled with all my clothes, down the red carpet like a geek, but then I took it off and no one could find it." 
"I thought 'I'll get it tomorrow', but it wasn't there!" 
Stacey then revealed she'd asked Joe if she could borrow his jeans and t-shirt, but he refused! 
She said: "He gave me his jacket and kicked me out of the car! 
"I couldn't wear my top because it smelt of B.O.!" Viewers were in disbelief (Photo: ITV) She still looked so good! (Photo: ITV) 
Despite insisting she'd showered, Stacey then confessed she was wearing the same makeup as the night before. 
But Loose Women viewers were in disbelief at Stacey, due to how good she looked! 
One said: "There's no chance @StaceySolomon slept in that make up." 
Another added: "Yes what a pretty tall tale...thought panelists were dressed by the loosewomen wardrobe team!"
